titles.title: Alaska Trails Act
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Chilkoot National Historic Trail and to provide for a study of the Alaska Long Trail, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Alaska Trails Act
This bill provides for the designation of the Chilkoot National Historic Trail in Alaska and the study of the Alaska Long Trail.
